h3401.definition: from {{h7378}}; literally he will contend; properly, adjective contentious; used as noun, an adversary; that content(-eth), that strive.

h3402.definition: the same as {{h3401}}; Jarib, the name of three Israelites; Jarib.

h3403.definition: from {{h3401}}; contentious; Jeribai, an Israelite; Jeribai.

h3404.definition: or יְרִיָּהוּ; from {{h3384}} and {{h3050}}; Jah will throw; Jerijah, an Israelite; Jeriah, Jerijah.

h3405.definition: or יְרֵחוֹ; or variation (1 Kings 16:34) יְרִיחֹה; perhaps from {{h3394}}; its month; or else from {{h7306}}; fragrant; Jericho or Jerecho, a place in Palestine; Jericho.

h3406.definition: or יְרֵימוֹת; or יְרֵמוֹת; feminine plural from {{h7311}}; elevations; Jerimoth or Jeremoth, the name of twelve Israelites; Jermoth, Jerimoth, and Ramoth (from the margin).

h3408.definition: plural of {{h3407}}; curtains; Jerioth, an Israelitess; Jerioth.

h3409.definition: from an unused root meaning to be soft; the thigh (from its fleshy softness); by euphemistically the generative parts; figuratively, a shank, flank, side; × body, loins, shaft, side, thigh.

h3411.definition: feminine of {{h3409}}; properly, the flank; but used only figuratively, the rear or recess; border, coast, part, quarter, side.

h3412.definition: from {{h7311}}; elevation; Jarmuth, the name of two places in Palestine; Jarmuth.

h3413.definition: from {{h7311}}; elevated; Jeremai, an Israelite; Jeremai.

h3414.definition: or יִרְמְיָהוּ; from {{h7311}} and {{h3050}}; Jah will rise; Jirmejah, the name of eight or nine Israelites; Jeremiah.

h3415.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be broken up (with any violent action) i.e. (figuratively) to fear; be grevious (only Isaiah 15:4; the rest belong to {{h7489}}).

h3416.definition: from {{h7495}} and {{h410}}; God will heal; Jirpeel, a place in Palestine; Irpeel.

h3417.definition: a primitive root; to spit; × but, spit.

h3418.definition: from {{h3417}} (in the sense of vacuity of color); properly, pallor, i.e. hence, the yellowish green of young and sickly vegetation; concretely, verdure, i.e. grass or vegetation; grass, green (thing).

h3419.definition: from the same as {{h3418}}; properly, green; concretely, a vegetable; green, herbs.

h3420.definition: from {{h3418}}; paleness, whether of persons (from fright), or of plants (from drought); greenish, yellow.

h3421.definition: from {{h7324}} and {{h5971}}; people will be poured forth; Jorkeam, a place in Palestine; Jorkeam.

h3422.definition: from the same as {{h3418}}; yellowishness; greenish, yellow.

h3423.definition: or יָרֵשׁ; a primitive root; to occupy (by driving out previous tenants, and possessing in their place); by implication, to seize, to rob, to inherit; also to expel, to impoverish, to ruin; cast out, consume, destroy, disinherit, dispossess, drive(-ing) out, enjoy, expel, × without fail, (give to, leave for) inherit(-ance, -or)   magistrate, be (make) poor, come to poverty, (give to, make to) possess, get (have) in (take) possession, seize upon, succeed, × utterly.

h3425.definition: from {{h3423}}; something occupied; a conquest; also a patrimony; heritage, inheritance, possession.

h3426.definition: perhaps from an unused root meaning to stand out, or exist; entity; used adverbially or as a copula for the substantive verb ({{h1961}}); there is or are (or any other form of the verb to be, as may suit the connection); (there) are, (he, it, shall, there, there may, there shall, there should) be, thou do, had, hast, (which) hath, (I, shalt, that) have, (he, it, there) is, substance, it (there) was, (there) were, ye will, thou wilt, wouldest.

h3427.definition: a primitive root; properly, to sit down (specifically as judge. in ambush, in quiet); by implication, to dwell, to remain; causatively, to settle, to marry; (make to) abide(-ing), continue, (cause to, make to) dwell(-ing), ease self, endure, establish, × fail, habitation, haunt, (make to) inhabit(-ant), make to keep (house), lurking, × marry(-ing), (bring again to) place, remain, return, seat, set(-tle), (down-) sit(-down, still, -ting down, -ting (place) -uate), take, tarry.

h3428.definition: from {{h3427}} and {{h1}}; seat of (his) father; Jeshebab, an Israelite; Jeshebeab.

h3429.definition: from the active participle of {{h3427}} and {{h7674}}, with a preposition and the article interposed; sitting in the seat; Joshebbash-Shebeth, an Israelite; that sat in the seat.

h3430.definition: from {{h3427}} and {{h5011}}, with a pronominal suffix and a preposition interposed; his dwelling (is) in Nob; Jishbo-be-Nob, a Philistine; Ishbi-benob (from the margin).

h3431.definition: from {{h7623}}; he will praise; Jishbach, an Israelite; Ishbah.

h3432.definition: patronymically from {{h3437}}; a Jashubite, or descendant of Jashub; Jashubites.

h3433.definition: from {{h7725}} and {{h3899}}; returner of bread; Jashubi-Lechem, an Israelite; Jashubi-lehem. (Prob. the text should be pointed יֹשְׁבֵי לֶחֶם and rendered '(they were) inhabitants of Lechem,' i.e. of Bethlehem (by contraction). Compare {{h3902}}).

h3434.definition: from {{h7725}} and {{h5971}}; people will return; Jashobam, the name of two or three Israelites; Jashobeam.

h3435.definition: from an unused root corresponding to {{h7662}}; he will leave; Jishbak, a son of Abraham; Ishbak.

h3436.definition: from {{h3427}} and {{h7186}}; a hard seat; Joshbekashah, an Israelite; Joshbekashah.

h3437.definition: or יָשִׁיב; from {{h7725}}; he will return; Jashub, the name of two Israelites; Jashub.

h3438.definition: from {{h7737}}; he will level; Jishvah, an Israelite; Ishvah, Isvah.

h3439.definition: from the same as {{h3445}} and {{h3050}}; Jah will empty; Jeshochajah, an Israelite; Jeshoaiah.

h3440.definition: from {{h7737}}; level; Jishvi, the name of two Israelites; Ishuai, Ishvi, Isui, Jesui.

h3441.definition: patronymically from {{h3440}}; a Jishvite (collectively) or descendants of Jishvi; Jesuites.

h3442.definition: for {{h3091}}; he will save; Jeshua, the name of ten Israelites, also of a place in Palestine; Jeshua.

h3444.definition: feminine passive participle of {{h3467}}; something saved, i.e. (abstractly) deliverance; hence, aid, victory, prosperity; deliverance, health, help(-ing), salvation, save, saving (health), welfare.

h3445.definition: from an unused root meaning to gape (as the empty stomach); hunger; casting down.

h3446.definition: from {{h7831}}; he will laugh; Jischak, the heir of Abraham; Isaac. Compare {{h3327}}.

h3447.definition: a primitive root; to extend; hold out.

h3448.definition: by Aramaic אִישַׁי; from the same as {{h3426}}; extant; Jishai, David's father; Jesse.

h3449.definition: or יִשִּׁיָּהוּ; from {{h5383}} and {{h3050}}; Jah will lend; Jishshijah, the name of five Israelites; Ishiah, Isshiah, Ishijah, Jesiah.

h3450.definition: from {{h7760}} and {{h410}}; God will place; Jesimael, an Israelite; Jesimael.

h3451.definition: from {{h3456}}; desolation; let death seize (from the margin).

h3452.definition: from {{h3456}}; a desolation; desert, Jeshimon, solitary, wilderness.

h3453.definition: from {{h3486}}; an old man; (very) aged (man), ancient, very old.

h3454.definition: from {{h3453}}; aged; Jeshishai, an Israelite; Jeshishai.

h3455.definition: a primitive root; to place; intransitively, to be placed; be put (set).

h3456.definition: a primitive root; to lie waste; be desolate.

h3457.definition: from {{h3456}}; desolate; Jishma, an Israelite; Ishma.

h3458.definition: from {{h8085}} and {{h410}}; God will hear; Jishmael, the name of Abraham's oldest son, and of five Israelites; Ishmael.

h3459.definition: patronymically from {{h3458}}; a Jishmaelite or descendant of Jishmael; Ishmaelite.

h3460.definition: or יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּlemma יְשְׁמַעְיָהוּ first vowel, corrected to יִשְׁמַעְיָהוּ; from {{h8085}} and {{h3050}}; Jah will hear; Jishmajah, the name of two Israelites; Ishmaiah.

h3461.definition: from {{h8104}}; preservative; Jishmerai, an Israelite; Ishmerai.

h3462.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be slack or languid, i.e. (by implication) sleep (figuratively, to die); also to grow old, stale or inveterate; old (store), remain long, (make to) sleep.

h3463.definition: from {{h3462}}; sleepy; asleep, (one out of) sleep(-eth, -ing), slept.

h3464.definition: the same as {{h3463}}; Jashen, an Israelite; Jashen.

h3466.definition: feminine of {{h3465}}; Jeshanah, a place in Palestine; Jeshanah.

h3467.definition: a primitive root; properly, to be open, wide or free, i.e. (by implication) to be safe; causatively, to free or succor; × at all, avenging, defend, deliver(-er), help, preserve, rescue, be safe, bring (having) salvation, save(-iour), get victory.

h3468.definition: or יֵשַׁע; from {{h3467}}; liberty, deliverance, prosperity; safety, salvation, saving.

h3469.definition: from {{h3467}}; saving; Jishi, the name of four Israelites; Ishi.

h3470.definition: or יְשַׁעְיָהוּ; from {{h3467}} and {{h3050}}; Jah has saved; Jeshajah, the name of seven Israelites; Isaiah, Jesaiah, Jeshaiah.

h3471.definition: from an unused root meaning to polish; a gem supposed to be jasper (from the resemblance in name); jasper.

h3472.definition: perhaps from {{h8192}}; he will scratch; Jishpah, an Israelite; Ispah.

h3473.definition: probably from the same as {{h8227}}; he will hide; Jishpan, an Israelite; Ishpan.

h3474.definition: a primitive root; to be straight or even; figuratively, to be (causatively, to make) right, pleasant, prosperous; direct, fit, seem good (meet),   please (will), be (esteem, go) right (on), bring (look, make, take the) straight (way), be upright(-ly).

h3475.definition: from {{h3474}}; the right; Jesher, an Israelite; Jesher.

h3476.definition: from {{h3474}}; the right; equity, meet, right, upright(-ness).

h3477.definition: from {{h3474}}; straight (literally or figuratively); convenient, equity, Jasher, just, meet(-est),   pleased well right(-eous), straight, (most) upright(-ly, -ness).

h3478.definition: from {{h8280}} and {{h410}}; he will rule as God; Jisraël, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity; Israel.

h3480.definition: by variation from {{h3477}} and {{h410}} with directive enclitic; right towards God; Jesarelah, an Israelite; Jesharelah.

h3481.definition: patronymically from {{h3478}}; a Jisreelite or descendant of Jisrael; of Israel, Israelite.

h3482.definition: feminine of {{h3481}}; a Jisreelitess or female descendant of Jisrael; Israelitish.

h3484.definition: from {{h3474}}; upright; Jeshurun, a symbolic name for Israel; Jeshurun.

h3485.definition: (strictly yis-saws-kawr'); from {{h5375}} and {{h7939}}; he will bring a reward; Jissaskar, a son of Jacob; Issachar.

h3486.definition: from an unused root meaning to blanch; gray-haired, i.e. an aged man; stoop for age.

h3487.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h853}}; a sign of the object of a verb; whom.

h3488.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h3427}}; to sit or dwell; dwell, (be) set, sit.

h3489.definition: from an unused root meaning to pin through or fast; a peg; nail, paddle, pin, stake.

h3490.definition: from an unused root meaning to be lonely; a bereaved person; fatherless (child), orphan.

h3491.definition: passive participle of {{h3498}}; properly, what is left, i.e. (by implication) a gleaning; range.

h3492.definition: from {{h3498}}; redundant; Jattir, a place in Palestine; Jattir.

h3493.definition: (Aramaic) corresponding to {{h3492}}; preeminent; as an adverb, very; exceeding(-ly), excellent.

h3494.definition: probably from {{h8518}}; it will hang, i.e. be high; Jithlah, a place in Palestine; Jethlah.

h3495.definition: from the same as {{h3490}}; orphanage; Jithmah, an Israelite; Ithmah.

h3496.definition: from an unused root meaning to endure, and {{h410}}; continued of God; Jathniel, an Israelite; Jathniel.

h3497.definition: from the same as {{h8577}}; extensive; Jithnan, a place in Palestine; Ithnan.

h3498.definition: a primitive root; to jut over or exceed; by implication, to excel; (intransitively) to remain or be left; causatively to leave, cause to abound, preserve; excel, leave (a remnant), left behind, too much, make plenteous, preserve, (be, let) remain(-der, -ing, -nant), reserve, residue, rest.

h3499.definition: from {{h3498}}; properly, an overhanging, i.e. (by implication) an excess, superiority, remainder; also a small rope (as hanging free); abundant, cord, exceeding, excellancy(-ent), what they leave, that hath left, plentifully, remnant, residue, rest, string, with.

h3500.definition: the same as {{h3499}}; Jether, the name of five or six Israelites and of one Midianite; Jether, Jethro. Compare {{h3503}}.
